title: Honor Level 0
body:
Hello, i got ban 2 weeks then i got unbanned i got Dishonorable so i played and played games to get again rewards. And after 5-4 days i got  something and it said Honor Unlocked You unlocked loot and Honor rewards  again. And after this i playd so much times and still Honor level 0
Please help me, i still get rewards back or no?

replies.body: The message about your honor unlocking was letting you know that you were able to earn hextech related honor rewards again. You'll still need to play games and get honored in order to rank back up.
